meaning: tag, paper money, counter for bonds, placard, bid

onyomiExamples.meaning: making a bid, tendering a bid

kunyomiExamples.meaning: ticket, token, check, receipt, label, tag, sign, card, plate, playing card, charm, talisman, slip of paper posted on shrine pillars by pilgrims
bulletin board, notice board, billboard, roadside sign, sign on a post, usu. wooden, esp. containing information about a sight, warning, congratulations, etc.
check (e.g. baggage claim), tag, token, tally, score
